languages.text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, я приму это предложение. Какой мне толк с горстки друкари, что сгрудилась у тебя за спиной, Караэль? Ответь мне — Опустошительная буря еще жива? Или это предсмертный стон павших?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, я приму это предложение. Какой мне толк с горстки друкари, что сгрудилась у тебя за спиной, Караэль? Мне нужен хороший повод, чтобы тратить на вас свое время и силы".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, я приму это предложение. Какой мне толк с горстки друкари, что сгрудилась у тебя за спиной, Караэль? Ответь мне — Опустошительная буря еще жива? Или это предсмертный стон павших?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for a handful of Drukhari huddling behind your back, Kharael? Answer me, does the Reaving Tempest still leave? Or is this a death rattle of the fallen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for a handful of Drukhari huddling behind your back, Kharael? Answer me, does the Reaving Tempest still leave? Or is this a death rattle of the fallen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Sagen wir, ich nehme Euer Angebot an. Welche Verwendung habe ich für die Handvoll von Drukhari, die hinter Euch kauern, Kharael? Antwortet mir — lebt der plündernde Sturm noch? Oder ist das nur das Todesröcheln der Gefallenen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Sagen wir, ich nehme Euer Angebot an. Welche Verwendung habe ich für die Handvoll von Drukhari, die hinter Euch kauern, Kharael? Antwortet mir — lebt der plündernde Sturm noch? Oder ist das nur das Todesröcheln der Gefallenen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋伊眯起眼睛。{/n}“就算我接受你的提议，你身后那几个瑟瑟发抖的黑暗灵族又能派上什么用场，卡瑞尔？回答我，狂风阴谋团还在吗？还是说，这就是它临死前的哀鸣？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋伊眯起眼睛。{/n}“就算我接受你的提议，你身后那几个瑟瑟发抖的黑暗灵族又能派上什么用场，卡瑞尔？回答我，狂风阴谋团还在吗？还是说，这就是它临死前的哀鸣？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Admettons que j'accepte votre offre. À quoi me servirait la poignée de Drukharis agglutinée derrière vous, Kharael ? Répondez-moi franchement... La Tempête ravageuse existe-t-elle toujours ? Ou s'agit-il de son dernier râle d'agonie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Admettons que j'accepte votre offre. À quoi me servirait la poignée de Drukharis agglutinée derrière vous, Kharael ? Répondez-moi franchement... La Tempête ravageuse existe-t-elle toujours ? Ou s'agit-il de son dernier râle d'agonie ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Supongamos que acepto tu oferta. ¿De qué me sirve el puñado de Drukhari que tienes acurrucados detrás, Kharael? Responde: ¿vive aún la Tempestad Asoladora, o estoy ante los estertores de los moribundos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Supongamos que acepto tu oferta. ¿De qué me sirve el puñado de Drukhari que tienes acurrucados detrás, Kharael? Responde: ¿vive aún la Tempestad Asoladora, o estoy ante los estertores de los moribundos?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが目を細める。{/n}「申し出を受けることにしよう。お前の後ろで身を寄せ合うわずかなデュカーリのために、俺に何ができるんだ、カラエル？答えてくれ、略奪の嵐はまだ生きているのか？それともこれは、死者たちの断末魔なのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが目を細める。{/n}「申し出を受けることにしよう。お前の後ろで身を寄せ合うわずかなデュカーリのために、俺に何ができるんだ、カラエル？答えてくれ、略奪の嵐はまだ生きているのか？それともこれは、死者たちの断末魔なのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Teklifini kabul ettim diyelim. Arkandaki bir avuç Drukhari ne işime yarayacak Kharael? Bana yanıt ver: Müfteris Kasırga hâlâ yaşıyor mu? Yoksa ölümü, eli kulağında da can mı çekişiyor?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Let us say I accept your offer. What use do I have for the handful of Drukhari huddling behind you, Kharael? Answer me — does the Reaving Tempest still live? Or is this the death rattle of the fallen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Teklifini kabul ettim diyelim. Arkandaki bir avuç Drukhari ne işime yarayacak Kharael? Bana yanıt ver: Müfteris Kasırga hâlâ yaşıyor mu? Yoksa bunlar can çekişme sesleri mi?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
